summary.para: The TASKDIALOG_BUTTON structure contains information used to display a button in a task dialog. The structure uses this structure.
Indicates the value to be returned when this button is selected.

Pointer that references the string to be used to label the button. This parameter can be either a null-terminated string or an integer resource identifier passed to the macro. When using Command Links, you delineate the command from the note by placing a new line character in the string.
